ModMetaData.name: [SIC] Co-Spousal Relations
ModMetaData.author: Sicarious
ModMetaData.description: Adds an implied relationship between people in marriage to the same person, and removes the mood penalty for sharing a bed so long as their mutual spouse is present. Also allows Co-Spoouses to share a bed even with the "Spouse Only: Strict" Physical Love precept from Ideology, and adds a slightly boosted chance to explore their own romantic potential. Tested with Polyamory Beds Vanilla Edition, Royalty and Ideology.
